description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As an entrepreneur, he founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format. Based in Taipei, yeehaa focuses on transforming education, knowledge sharing, and fostering inclusive internet ecosystems. His work explores internet fragmentation, ecosystem architecture, and innovative approaches to global challenges. yeehaa's blog posts delve into topics like the evolution of ecosystems, internet fragmentation, and the concept of 'foam' in digital spaces. His curated courses cover ecosystem grooming, preserving web diversity, practicing innovation, and valuing differences, reflecting his commitment to personal growth, creativity, and inclusive dialogue.
blurb: yeehaa, an ecosystem architect with a PhD, blends academia and tech to transform education and foster inclusive internet ecosystems. His work explores internet fragmentation, ecosystem architecture, and innovative approaches to global challenges.
